title: The Crypto Ponzi Scheme Avenger
description: From his home in New Zealand, the YouTuber Danny de Hek assails what he calls a dangerous and deceptive scheme, one rant at a time.
dc:creator: David Segal
media:credit: Tatsiana Chypsanava for The New York Times
media:description: Danny de Hek advised his YouTube viewers that HyperFund was a scam.
